refnamediv.refpurpose: Runs GTP commands on all positions of game collections.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Runs a a set of commands for a Go program supporting the Go Text Protocol on each position of Go game collections. The results are stored in the text file "gtpstatistics.dat" in table format.

Games must not contain setup stones. On positions containing a move, the command reg_genmove is run first for the color of the move, and the generated move is compared to the actual move. This result is stored in the table, too.
The return value of gtpstatistics is 0, if the run completed successfully, -1 otherwise.

listitem.para: Read command line options and arguments from file.
Comma separated list of GTP commands to run on each position.
Print the GTP stream to the Go program to standard error.
